summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3922 for the improvement of 20th Avenue Northeast, from East 75th Street to the line of East 85th Street produced, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 47742, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
